title: 4 BEDROOM 2 FULL BATHROOM LUXURY APARTMENT
posting_body: ['Available for September 1 occupancy, this beautifully gut renovated 4 bedroom/2 bath apartment with modern updates features a private balcony, updated kitchen (with dishwasher), wine cooler, and an in-unit washer and dryer.', 'Additional features include:', 'Details:', '*balcony', '*washer/dryer', '*modern bathroom', '*modern kitchen', '*dishwasher', '*microwave', '*wine cooler', '*hardwood floors', '*high ceilings', 'Location:Conveniently located near public transportation, this apartment is just steps from the M11 bus and a short walk to the A, C, E train lines.', 'APARTMENT FEATURES', 'Washer / Dryer', 'High Ceilings', 'KITCHEN', 'Dishwasher', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Microwave', 'Countertops [Granite]', 'BATHROOM', 'Marble', 'OUTDOOR SPACE', 'Balcony', 'BUILDING DESCRIPTION', 'Built 1915', 'Low-rise', '5 Floors', '8 Apartments', 'Walk-Up', 'Voice Intercom', 'BUILDING POLICIES', 'Income Required: 40x Rent', 'Guarantors Allowed', 'Guarantors Income Required: 60x Rent', 'Insurent Allowed', 'TheGuarantors Allowed', 'Walls Allowed: Case By Case', 'Minimum Term: 12 months', 'BUILDING PET POLICY', 'Pets Allowed.', 'BUILDING FEES', 'Credit Check Fee: $40.00.']
